==Serial killers==
==Serial killers==
â
Necrophilia has also been a motive for some [[serial killer]]s, including murderers [[Ed Gein]], [[Richard Chase]], [[Winston Moseley]], [[Bruno Ludke]], [[Jerry Brudos]], and [[Jeffrey Dahmer]], who ate his victims after killing them BECAUSE HE WAS A MESSED UP MOTHER F******!!!!!!!!!!!!!. Several other [[murder]]ers have described drawing sexual excitement from killing, as well, such as [[Karla Faye Tucker]], who claimed to have an [[orgasm]] with each swing of the [[axe]] she used to kill [[Jerry Lynn Dean]]. The guilty-plea testimony provided by the recently captured ([[2005]]) serial killer [[Dennis Rader]] provided a rare public glimpse into the workings of such a controlling mind.
+
Necrophilia has also been a motive for some [[serial killer]]s, including murderers [[Ed Gein]], [[Richard Chase]], [[Winston Moseley]], [[Bruno Ludke]], [[Jerry Brudos]], and [[Jeffrey Dahmer]], who ate his victims after killing them. Several other [[murder]]ers have described drawing sexual excitement from killing, as well, such as [[Karla Faye Tucker]], who claimed to have an [[orgasm]] with each swing of the [[axe]] she used to kill [[Jerry Lynn Dean]]. The guilty-plea testimony provided by the recently captured ([[2005]]) serial killer [[Dennis Rader]] provided a rare public glimpse into the workings of such a controlling mind.
